title: Glooko - Track Diabetes Data
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Glooko is a comprehensive diabetes management platform that helps people with diabetes understand and control their blood glucose levels and well being. Track your blood glucose, insulin, weight, exercise, food and more, all in one place. Designed to enhance the patient and provider relationship, Glooko helps you stay connected with your Care Team(s) between visits, identify trends, share reports with friends/family, and keep all your diabetes data in one place. Best of all, the Glooko Mobile App is free to use!


Glooko works seamlessly with popular devices to sync data from your blood glucose (BG) meter, insulin pump, and/or continuous glucose monitor (CGM) as well as smart scales and activity trackers. Data can be synced from compatible connected devices, from compatible 3rd party apps, or manually inputted. Please see www.glooko.com/compatibility for a complete list of compatible devices and apps.


WHAT’S NEW:


• Revamped Home Screen - Enjoy a modern look and feel for easier navigation and quick access to Glooko’s most popular features.
• Care Teams Hub -  Easily view which Care Teams you're sharing share data with and/or create reports to share with.
• Data Visualizations - Quickly get a summary of all your data from the past two weeks.
• Streamlined Onboarding - Introducing new onboarding goals that guide users through Glooko, step-by-step.


POPULAR FEATURES:


• Automatically share your data with your doctor(s) through unique ProConnect codes.
• View glucose trends in multiple ways, using the same reports & charts as your care team.
• Use a digital logbook to automatically track all your activities and events in one place.
 - Sync data from most BG meters, insulin pumps, and CGM.
 - Sync data from popular activity trackers such as Apple Health, Fitbit, etc.
 - Add food/carb intake using the built-in barcode scanner or voice activated database.
• Set reminders to check glucose levels, take medication, or other prompts.
• Credentialed data security and privacy compliance. Please see www.glooko.com/trust-privacy/ to learn more.

The Glooko® app replaces the diasend® app
